Own Choice from a Specified List
City Hall, Newcastle-upon-Tyne Test pieces were a choice of Tam O'Shanter's Ride, Belmont Variations or High Peak. 3rd annual contest promoted by Newcastle and District Trades Council.
March 25, 2013, 9:26 p.m. March 25, 2013, 9:31 p.m.
1 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham High Peak
2 Cooperation Band Enoch Jackson Tam O'Shanter's Ride [Wright]
3 Easington Colliery Band Cecil Peacock Tam O'Shanter's Ride [Wright]
4 Lochgelly Band Archie Smith The Belmont Variations
